pullrequest.title: [Acropolis] Change usage of our version inline namespace so that it comes right after ignition::gazebo

content.raw:
Systems now use plugin aliases. If you've reviewed this already, the changes are:

* fb4301f: Revert removing the version inline namespace
* d0136eb: Add plugin aliases. **Note** that I had to remove the [piece of code](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/193/acropolis-change-usage-of-our-version/diff#Lsrc/SystemLoader.ccF86) that checks for valid plugins because it didn't take into account plugin aliases. I think checking if the plugin can be instantiated is sufficient to determine if it's a valid plugin.
